activities:
Personal information may be collected from customers including, but not limited to, a first and last name, email address, a physical address, other contact information, title, occupation, industry, and other information when needed to provide a service requested by the customer.
When Dimension Data needs personal information to provide services requested, provide access customer portal or when customer chooses to provide Dimension Data with personal information, our privacy policy describes how we collect and use your personal information.

recoursemech: Dimension Data fully complies with the IT-industry privacy programs that incorporate the Safe Harbor Principles into their rules,complies with all applicable laws and regulations and is committed to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (FDPIC) or their authorized representatives.
